headline: Hilton Announces Pricing of Senior Notes Offering
summary: MCLEAN, Va., December 01, 2025--Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (NYSE: HLT) ("Hilton") announced today that its indirect subsidiary Hilton Domestic Operating Company Inc. (the "Issuer") successfully finalized the terms of the Issuer’s offering of $1 billion aggregate principal amount of 5.500% Senior Notes due 2034 (the "Notes"). The Issuer anticipates that consummation of the offering will occur on December 10, 2025, subject to customary closing conditions, and intends to use the net proceeds of

headline: Hilton Announces Launch of Senior Notes Offering
summary: MCLEAN, Va., December 01, 2025--Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (NYSE: HLT) ("Hilton") announced today that its indirect subsidiary Hilton Domestic Operating Company Inc. (the "Issuer") intends to offer $1 billion aggregate principal amount of the Issuer’s Senior Notes due 2034 (the "Notes"). The Issuer intends to use the net proceeds of the offering to redeem all $500 million in aggregate principal amount of the Issuer's outstanding 5.750% Senior Notes due 2028 and to pay all fees and expenses r
